headline: Berry Global Set to be Acquired by Amcor in an All-Stock Deal
summary: BERY is set to be acquired by Amcor to form a global leader in consumer packaging solutions with unmatched innovation and scale.

raw.headline: Berry Global Set to be Acquired by Amcor in an All-Stock Deal

headline: How packaging producers performed in EMF’s 2024 progress report
summary: This week’s Ellen MacArthur Foundation report comes as the plastics world anticipates the conclusion of key global negotiations. Here’s how North American signatories are faring on sustainable design in their portfolios.
